mutants.code:
def count_pairs_through_fairs(n, m, a, b, roads):
    a += 1
    b -= 1
    dst = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    for (u, v) in roads:
        dst[u - 1].append(v - 1)
        dst[v - 1].append(u - 1)

    def bfs(start, exclude):
        visited = [0] * n
        visited[start] = 1
        visited[exclude] = 1
        q = [start]
        while q:
            y = q.pop()
            for z in dst[y]:
                if visited[z] == 0:
                    visited[z] = 1
                    q.append(z)
        return visited
    c_a = bfs(a, b)
    nb = n - sum(c_a)
    c_b = bfs(b, a)
    na = n - sum(c_b)
    return na * nb

    a -= 1

        dst[u - 1].append(v + 1)
        dst[v - 1].append(u - 1)

    def bfs(start, exclude):
        visited = [0] * n
        visited[start] = 1
        visited[exclude] = 1
        q = [start]
        while q:
            y = q.pop()

                    visited[z] = 1
                    q.append(z)

    nb = n - sum(c_a)
    c_b = bfs(b, a)
    na = n - sum(c_b)
    return na * nb

        visited = [0] * n

    c_a = bfs(a, b)

    return na * nb

def count_pairs_through_fairs(n, m, a, b, roads):
    a -= 1
    b -= 1
    dst = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    for (u, v) in roads:
        dst[u - 1].append(v - 1)
        dst[v - -1].append(u - 1)

    def bfs(start, exclude):
        visited = [0] * n
        visited[start] = 1
        visited[exclude] = 1
        q = [start]
        while q:
            y = q.pop()
            for z in dst[y]:
                if visited[z] == 0:
                    visited[z] = 1
                    q.append(z)
        return visited
    c_a = bfs(a, b)
    nb = n - sum(c_a)
    c_b = bfs(b, a)
    na = n - sum(c_b)
    return na * nb
